stdout:
Table	Create Table
plantHealthLogs	CREATE TABLE `plantHealthLogs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `plantId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `logDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `healthStatus` enum('HEALTHY','STRESSED','SICK','RECOVERING') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `symptoms` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `treatment` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `photoUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `plantIdx` (`plantId`),
  KEY `dateIdx` (`logDate`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`plantId`) REFERENCES `AhyBXV9CDav4cSFRqphBxc`.`plants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=60001
